Thanks for bringing that to my attention. Actually someone is now 
helping me get this series (YOU KNOW WHO YOU ARE AND THANK YOU VERY 
MUCH ^_^)

I've bookmarked the site though. I've missed a lot of post when I 
went on vacation, so I really appreciate that you brought this to my 
attention... Arigatou!

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "k_closson2001" <k_closson2001@y...> 
wrote:
> --- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Grace Battista" <mg_batt@y...> wrote:
> >To those who are taping the series... Is there anyway you can 
> >encode and post those up for download? If not...
> 
>  Barbara posted the bit torrent link a few weeks back so that is 
> probably your best bet if you are looking to store them on a ftp 
> server:
> 
> http://tinyurl.com/23f6v
> 
>  If you have access to binaries there is a guy uploading a SVCD 
> version in the alt.binaries.multimedia.japanese.
> 
>  I collect these type of samurai movies and TV series so I am 
doing 
> the full DVD-R conversion for myself to watch on stand alone 
players. 
> Anyone can get that from me, but due to size it isn't really 
suitable 
> for ftp downloading.
> 
> Kevin
